Title: Outlook: Meeting Details in the Reading Pane on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
Description:
When a conversation in Mail is part of a meeting, the Reading Pane will have a new and improved Meeting Details card for a more efficient and modern RSVP flow. This will come to Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: September CY2024
